ClassDecl.Name: GuiGraphicsHost
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> GuiGraphicsHost hosts an <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::compositions::GuiWindowComposition@s:vl.presentation.compositions.GuiWindowComposition" /></links> in an <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::INativeWindow@s:vl.presentation.INativeWindow" /></links>. The composition will fill the whole window. </summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetNativeWindow
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Associate a window. A <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::compositions::GuiWindowComposition@s:vl.presentation.compositions.GuiWindowComposition" /></links> will fill and appear in the window.</summary> <param name="_nativeWindow">The window to associated.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetMainComposition
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the main <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::compositions::GuiWindowComposition@s:vl.presentation.compositions.GuiWindowComposition" /></links>. If a window is associated, everything that put into the main composition will be shown in the window.</summary> <returns>The main compositoin.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Render
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Render the main composition and all content to the associated window.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetShortcutKeyManager
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::compositions::IGuiShortcutKeyManager@s:vl.presentation.compositions.IGuiShortcutKeyManager" /></links> attached with this graphics host.</summary> <returns>The shortcut key manager.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetShortcutKeyManager
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Attach or detach the <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::compositions::IGuiShortcutKeyManager@s:vl.presentation.compositions.IGuiShortcutKeyManager" /></links> associated with this graphics host. When this graphics host is disposing, the associated shortcut key manager will be deleted if exists.</summary> <param name="value">The shortcut key manager. Set to null to detach the previous shortcut key manager from this graphics host.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetFocus
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the focus composition. A focused composition will receive keyboard messages.</summary> <returns>Returns true if this operation succeeded.</returns> <param name="composition">The composition to set focus. This composition should be or in the main composition.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetFocusedComposition
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the focus composition. A focused composition will receive keyboard messages.</summary> <returns>The focus composition.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetCaretPoint
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the caret point. A caret point is the position to place the edit box of the activated input method editor.</summary> <returns>The caret point.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetCaretPoint
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the caret point. A caret point is the position to place the edit box of the activated input method editor.</summary> <param name="value">The caret point.</param> <param name="referenceComposition">The point space. If this argument is null, the "value" argument will use the point space of the client area in the main composition.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: DisconnectComposition
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Notify that a composition is going to disconnect from this graphics host. Generally this happens when a composition's parent line changes.</summary> <param name="composition">The composition to disconnect</param> </Document>
